Description: Date nights should only include formal wear.
Office or professional attire should only include formal wear.
Dress tops should not inlude bottoms.
Office attire should not include stilettos and pumps footwear.
Office attire should not include sneakers.
Office attire and formal occassion should not include denim pants.
Office attire should not include hat/cap accessories.
Men attire should not include women attrire, Women attire should not include men attire.
